title: The Science and Psychology of Polarisation (pt 1 of 4)
description:
How can we even begin to solve many of society's problems if our conversations keep breaking down? Polarisation has been growing for decades, and supercharged by social media filter bubbles.

This is the first in a series of films from Rebel Wisdom looking at the science and psychology of polarisation.

We speak to Alex Evans, a former government adviser now looking at the roots of division through the Collective Psychology Project: https://www.collectivepsychology.org/

Also to superstar trauma specialists Dr Stephen Porges, Peter Levine, Gina Ross and Steve Haines about how our nervous system is intimately involved in assessing safety and threat, and how that underlies all conflict and polarisation. 

We will be releasing one of these films each Thursday in August. However, supporters can see them immediately in the members area of our website. To get immediate access to the full interviews with Dr Stephen Porges and Peter Levine, and to help us make more of these films, please consider becoming a supporter: www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

Extracts also from: Deep Code with Jordan Green(Hall): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_j3cCrpXERg

Hacking Collective Intelligence, Jamie Wheal: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BtdJy87z0Ys&t=483s

To get access to more exclusive content, become a Rebel Wisdom subscriber: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

We've also just launched the Rebel Wisdom store! Buy T Shirts and more on https://shop.rebelwisdom.co.uk

You can listen to a podcast versions of our films on Spotify or Apple Podcasts by searching 'Rebel Wisdom' or download episodes from our Podbean page: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com/ 

We also have a Rebel Wisdom Discord discussion channel: https://discord.gg/RK4MeYW
